divs: Sighting DetailsWe were driving home that evening; and as we turned to enter our neighborhood, I spotted lights in the sky. When I looked through the windshield and then out my side window (by this time it was almost directly overhead, flying toward us), I clearly saw a fairly large, elongated triangle shape that was darker than the sky. There were multiple green lights running lengthwise down the center. The shape was very distinct--no protrusions anywhere, just straight edges. Because of the terrain and trees which obscured my view as we turned, I could only get one more brief glimpse--this time from the rear. All the lights appeared yellow from that angle. I was unable to see a side or top view at any point, only the underside. My husband did not see it (though he was certainly aware that I did!), and we did not stop the car or cut off the engine; however, in retrospect, neither of us remember hearing any sound. I know it was not an ordinary airplane; and it seemed too low for a flight approaching the Greenville-Spartanburg airport. It all happened VERY quickly, and I very much regret not insisting that we turn around and try to catch sight of it again.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Mauldin
This sighting has never been favorited.
